channel.title: still on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in still on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-06
item.description: Google planning Apple-like integration between its products to compete (3 minute read) Google has announced plans to rival Apple’s ecosystem integration at CES 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-28
item.description: LG Display shows off a versatile lineup of transparent OLED screens at CES 2022 (3 minute read) LG Display has unveiled several new concepts that will be on display at CES 2022.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-31
item.description: Amazon acquires podcast network Wondery (1 minute read) Podcast network Wondery will soon become part of Amazon Music.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-05
item.description: Apple imagines a foldable iPhone with a ‘self-healing’ display (2 minute read) Apple filed a patent in January for a foldable smartphone with a self-healing display that could repair dents or scratches on the screen.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-29
item.description: Apple vs. Epic hearing previews a long, hard-fought trial to come (3 minute read) Epic’s request for a temporary injunction in its case against Apple was heard recently.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-23
item.description: Here are Tesla’s biggest announcements from Battery Day (3 minute read) Elon Musk made some big announcements at Tesla’s Battery Day event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-16
item.description: Here’s everything Apple just announced (9 minute read) Apple has announced a new virtual fitness service, a subscription service called Apple One, and a new lineup of Apple Watches and iPads.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-09-01
item.description: Amazon’s Prime Air can officially begin drone delivery trials in the US (2 minute read) Amazon has officially become an air carrier, with the Federal Aviation Administration granting Amazon Prime Air approval to begin its first commercial delivery trials in the US.
